timeline.message:
fix(performance): optimize ModuleEnvironmentSandbox.getSubTypeIdentifier

Always use the class's fully-qualified Java class name as its type identifier, as ReflectionsSandbox does.

The previous implementation led to calling loadClass on *all* of Component's subclasses every time the serializer asked for this type identifier. We encountered scalability problems with that in #4126.

chore: move common getSubTypeIdentifier implementation to interface default

remove the test, because the default implementation is too mundane.

timeline.bodyText:
I think there are no longer any implementations of this that use baseType at all.
Should we change the interface and remove that parameter entirely?
If so, is this still a subtypeIdentifier, or is it just its Identifier?
timeline.author: keturn

replies.bodyText:
Probably just keep simplifying, if we need something like this in the future we could put it back in. Might still be good to hear from @eviltak
Additionally serialization and/or the whole ECS likely would majorly change when reintegrated as libraries anyway, so we don't have to aim for perfection right now
